heroes.name: Centered Hero with CTA
heroes.description: Centered hero section with headline, description, and call-to-action buttons

heroes.name: Dark Gradient Hero
heroes.description: Dark hero with gradient background and modern styling

heroes.name: Split Hero with Image
heroes.description: Two-column hero with content on left and image on right
heroes.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { Check } from 'lucide-react' export default function Hero() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Professional Solutions That Deliver Results", description: "Partner with industry experts who understand your challenges and deliver solutions that drive measurable growth for your business.", features: [ "Expert consultation and strategy", "Proven track record of success", "24/7 dedicated support team", "Custom solutions for your needs" ], ctaText: "Schedule Consultation", ctaHref: "/contact", heroImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551434678-e076c223a692?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" } return (

{data.headline}

{data.description}

    {data.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
{data.ctaText}
) }

heroes.name: Emergency Services Hero
heroes.description: Urgent response hero for emergency service businesses with 24/7 availability
heroes.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Phone, Clock, MapPin, Shield, Wrench, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react' export default function Hero() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Emergency Plumbing Services", description: "Fast, reliable emergency plumbing repair available 24/7. Licensed, insured, and trusted by homeowners throughout the metro area.", emergencyPhone: "(555) 911-HELP", responseTime: "30 Minutes", serviceAreas: "Metro Area & Surrounding Cities", primaryCta: { text: "Call Now for Emergency", href: "tel:555-911-4357" }, secondaryCta: { text: "Schedule Service", href: "/contact" }, features: [ "Licensed & Insured", "24/7 Emergency Service", "30-Minute Response Time", "Upfront Pricing" ] } return (
{/* Emergency Badge */}
24/7 EMERGENCY SERVICE AVAILABLE

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Key Stats */}
{data.emergencyPhone}
Emergency Hotline
{data.responseTime}
Response Time
{data.serviceAreas}
Service Coverage
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Trust Indicators */}
{data.features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature}
))}
) }

heroes.name: Professional Services Hero
heroes.description: Professional contractor hero with project showcases and guarantees
heroes.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { Award, Shield, Users, MapPin, Star, HardHat } from 'lucide-react' export default function Hero() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Quality Construction Services", description: "Professional contractors with 25+ years of experience. Licensed, insured, and committed to delivering exceptional results on every project.", yearsExperience: "25+", projectsCompleted: "500+", serviceAreas: "Tri-City Metro Area", primaryCta: { text: "Get Free Estimate", href: "/contact" }, secondaryCta: { text: "View Our Work", href: "/gallery" }, heroImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504307651254-35680f356dfd?w=600&h=400&fit=crop", guarantees: [ "100% Satisfaction Guarantee", "Licensed & Insured", "Free Estimates", "Warranty on All Work" ] } return (
{/* Credential Badge */}
Professional Contractors

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Key Stats */}
{data.yearsExperience}
Years Experience
{data.projectsCompleted}
Projects Done
{data.serviceAreas}
{/* Guarantees */}
{data.guarantees.map((guarantee, index) => (
{guarantee}
))}
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Trust Badge Overlay */}

Fully Licensed

& Insured Contractor

) }

heroes.name: Local Services Hero
heroes.description: Community-focused hero for local service businesses with testimonials
heroes.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Users, Home, MapPin, Heart, Phone } from 'lucide-react' export default function Hero() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Your Trusted Local Plumbing Experts", description: "Family-owned and operated for over 20 years. We're your neighbors, and we treat your home like our own.", yearsInBusiness: "20+", familyOwned: true, serviceAreas: ["Downtown", "Westside", "North Valley", "East Hills"], rating: "4.9", reviewCount: "200+", primaryCta: { text: "Call Today", href: "tel:555-123-4567" }, secondaryCta: { text: "Request Quote", href: "/contact" }, testimonial: { quote: "Best plumber in town! Fixed our emergency leak same day and didn't overcharge us.", author: "Jennifer Smith", location: "Downtown Resident" }, heroImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1621905252507-b35492cc74b4?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" } return (
{/* Local Badge */}
{data.familyOwned && 'Family Owned & Operated • '} Serving Our Community for {data.yearsInBusiness} Years

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Rating & Service Areas */}
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{data.rating} ({data.reviewCount} reviews)
Local Service
Service Areas: {data.serviceAreas.join(' • ')}
{/* Customer Testimonial */}

"{data.testimonial.quote}"

— {data.testimonial.author}, {data.testimonial.location}

{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Trust Badge */}
) }

heroes.name: Service Specialist Hero
heroes.description: Expert specialist hero for technical service businesses with certifications
heroes.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { Award, Wrench, Shield, Users, CheckCircle, Settings } from 'lucide-react' export default function Hero() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Expert HVAC Services & Repair", description: "Certified technicians specializing in heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems. Advanced diagnostics and energy-efficient solutions.", certifications: ["EPA Certified", "NATE Certified", "Licensed Contractor"], specializations: [ "Emergency Repairs", "System Installation", "Preventive Maintenance", "Energy Audits" ], teamSize: "12", warrantyYears: "5", primaryCta: { text: "Schedule Service", href: "/contact" }, secondaryCta: { text: "Emergency Repair", href: "tel:555-123-4567" }, heroImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1621905251189-08b45d6a269e?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" } return (
{/* Certification Banner */}
Certified Professionals
{data.certifications.join(' • ')}

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Specializations Grid */}
{data.specializations.map((spec, index) => (
{spec}
))}
{/* Team & Warranty Info */}
{data.teamSize} Expert Technicians
Certified Team
{data.warrantyYears}-Year Warranty
On All Work
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Certification Badge */}
CERTIFIED
EXPERTS
) }
